name: 語意學
comment: 教室位於雲和街大樓2樓（地址：雲和街1號），外系及外校學生需申請門禁權限。
goals: To let students have basic understanding of formal semantics and other areas of semantics.
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course aims to give students fundamental ideas of formal semantics. Studies in areas such as lexical semantics, aspect, tense, modality, cognitive linguistics, etc.  will also be discussed.

**Requirements and Evaluation**    

Presentation           20%

Term paper              30%

tests                      40%

Attendance, Participation, etc.   10%

**Schedule**                                                                        

Week 1    Introduction

Week 2    Kearns 2000 Ch. 1: Introduction; Saeed Ch.1: Semantics in Linguistics

Week 3     Saeed Ch. 2: Meaning, Thought and Reality   

Week 4    Saeed Ch. 3: Word meaning; (Storjohann 2016: Sense Relations)

Week 5  Kearns 2000: Ch.2: First Order Logic

Week 6 Kearns 2000: Ch.3 Modality and Possible Worlds**;** Li Ch. 2.1-2.4.1: Typology and Modality (pp.12-19)    

Week 7  Kearns 2000 Ch.4: Natural Language Quantifiers (4.1-4.3)

Week 8  Test 1

Week 9  Kearns 2000 Ch.4: Natural Language Quantifiers (4.4-4.6)

Week 10  Kearns 2000 ch.7: Tense and Aspect

Week 11  Kearns 2011 Ch.8: Aktionsarten: Aspectual Classes of Events

Week 12 Smith 1997 Ch. 1: the approach (Term paper outline due)

Week 13 Saeed Ch.11: Cognitive Semantics   

Week 14  Test 2

Week 15 Individual conference

Week 16 **Term paper presentation**

Week 17  term paper writing

Week 18   **Term paper due**

methodologies.note: The teacher will give out handouts and lecture on important theorectical parts.
The teacher and student will discuss important linguistic topics and proposals.
Students are required to write a term paper to discuss a specific linguistic topic.

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
